title: 104_hr3117
content: AUTHORITY TO ESTABLISH AND OPERATE MANAGED HEALTH-CARE PLANS. The Secretary of Veterans Affairs may establish managed health-care plans to deliver health services to veterans through Department facilities or other entities, following prescribed standards and minimum health care benefits. The Secretary may establish managed health-care plans for veterans, prescribing minimum health benefits including those covered under Medicare. An enrollment system may be established for veterans not described in a specific section. Cost-sharing requirements can be set to cover additional benefits not paid by Medicare, such as premiums, copayments, and deductibles. Payments for care provided to veterans enrolled in these plans shall be received accordingly. The Secretary may establish managed health-care plans for veterans, prescribing minimum health benefits including those covered under Medicare. Cost-sharing requirements can be set to cover additional benefits not paid by Medicare, such as enrollment premium, copayment charges, and deductibles. Payments for care provided to veterans enrolled in these plans shall be received accordingly and credited to the Department medical appropriation. Establishment of managed health-care plans with payment requirements for certain services provided by Department facilities. The new section 1729A of Chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code, allows the Secretary of Health and Human Services to make Medicare payments for certain veterans enrolled in Department managed health care plans. Managed health care plans providing care to Medicare-eligible veterans are deemed certified Medicare Choice organizations. The new section 1729A of Chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code allows the Secretary of Health and Human Services to certify Department managed health care plans for Medicare payments. Managed health care plans for Medicare-eligible veterans are considered certified Medicare Choice organizations. The new section 1729A of Chapter 17 of title 38, United States Code allows Medicare payment for certain veterans, effective after the enactment of this Act.
